content.rendered:
Every summer, Handshake partners gather from across the country to share best practices, trends, and successes. While we won’t be able to meet in person for the Handshake Access conference this year, our team and guest speakers have been hard at work to create an opportunity for the community to connect virtually. We are excited to invite you to join us at Handshake Access Summer Series 2020!

Handshake Access Summer Series 2020 will feature five virtual sessions held through June and July. Guest speakers include experts from:

  • University of Virginia
  • Westfield State University
  • Northern Arizona University
  • Wheaton College
  • University of North Carolina, Wilmington
  • Illinois Wesleyan University
  • Kennesaw State University
  • Kent State University

For a full list of topics and guest speakers, visit our registration page today. 

We look forward to sharing and learning with you this summer!

excerpt.rendered: Join us for a virtual series of knowledge and best practice sharing presented by your fellow career educators.
